entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:29 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -38.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this morning. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 30%
